meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Discover Terratech’s mission, vision, and values.

community.value: As a family-owned business in Charlotte, North Carolina, our mission is to serve our community and beyond with solutions that stand the test of time, creating a legacy of excellence for generations to come.

paragraphs: We saw an opportunity to change how construction materials and processes impact both the environment and long-term performance. Our proprietary materials deliver greater durability, environmental efficiency, and lower lifetime costs than leading brands.
We’re constantly researching, testing, and improving — because innovation isn’t a trend. It’s who we are.

cards.heading: Our Focus
cards.text: We don’t just build, we innovate. Our team leverages modern technology to enhance every phase of construction, from material selection to final inspection.

cards.heading: Our Experience
cards.text: With over 17 years of combined expertise, we’ve managed projects ranging from crawlspaces and foundations to full-scale renovations & concrete repair.

cards.heading: Our Commitment
cards.text: We believe in lasting relationships as much as lasting results. Every project we take on is treated as an opportunity to strengthen trust and community.

paragraphs: After years in the construction industry, we founded TerraTech Solutions with a simple goal: to build a company that makes a lasting impact—on people, on projects, and on the planet.
Instead of tearing out and rebuilding, we repair from below using eco-friendly poly-foam.
Our solutions are more than a quick, they’re durable, cost-effective solutions that last for generations.
